1752126504291561773.Text: I have heard of these creatures. Vicious and vile, they say. I hope not to meet them, but rest assured, if they disturb this fort, they will pay the price.

3218727187297387702.Text: Vile little beasts, but not as mindless as some may think. These creatures are intelligent, %PCName. Some are capable of speech, and all are capable of great cunning.

540746371366331072.Text: I cannot count the number of them I have bloodied my axe with. They are creatures hardly worthy of a warrior's attention. Mindless beasts.

2221312692148731030.Text: I've heard they're like little ice goblins. Sound like fodder to me.

1613013144314614084.Text: Foul creatures. Some call them the Falmer, claim they are related to the other elves. This I do not know, but they are vile. Some are intelligent enough to speak, but they speak only nonsense.

3148618490198625030.Text: Heard of them, but I've never seen one. I don't venture far to the north, and they don't come down this way. That suits me fine.

18382236423151121579.Text: They're vicious little things. If you see one, you're in for a fight. If you see one riding a Tusked Bristleback, you're in for a REAL fight.
